FuncDef:
The access-user loop-back on-card command configures the HQoS function to be implemented on the eTM for VE access users.
The undo access-user loop-back on-card command restores the default settings.
By default, the HQoS function is implemented on the TM for VE access users.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure the HQoS function to be implemented on the eTM for VE access users, run the access-user loop-back on-card command.
Precautions
This command is supported only on an LPUF-120/LPUF-240 that is equipped with the P480-A/P101-A/P51-E/LPUI-51-E/P101-E/P240-E/LPUI-480-B/P52-E.
